LanguageData.ESCP_RaceTools_SloadThrassianPlagueIncid: Sload do not raid the player. Being hostile to a Sload faction will instead enable the Thrassian Plague incident, but only if this setting is enabled.
LanguageData.ESCP_RaceTools_SloadThrassianFogAlert: Enable the alert for Thrassian Fog, displaying how many days it will remain for.
LanguageData.ESCP_RaceTools_SloadCanEquipAllWeapons: Disable Sload being able to wield two-handed weapons.
LanguageData.ESCP_RaceTools_SloadCanEquipAllWeapons_T: Works off the same system as Vanilla Expanded shields. If a weapon can't be used with a shield, a Sload can't wield it.
LanguageData.ESCP_RaceTools_SloadThrallNamesColourTra: Enable the Harmony transpiler for pawn tabs, allowing thrall names to appear purple.
Enable the Harmony transpiler for travel dialogue, allowing thrall names to appear purple.
Injects an additional check into vanilla code, disable if it causes issues. As it's a transpiler, you will need to restart the game for changes to take effect.
LanguageData.ESCP_RaceTools_SloadThrallSkillLimit: Allow the 'improve thrall skills' ability increasing levels past 20.
LanguageData.ESCP_RaceTools_SloadThrallResSkillDecayT:
If enabled, resurrecting a pawn as a thrall will cause the level of all skills to decay, with a 25% chance the level does not decrease at all.

A skill at level 20 will decrease by 5.
A skill at level 10 will decrease by 2.
A skill at level 5 will decrease by 1.
A skill at, or below, level 3 will not decrease at all.
LanguageData.ESCP_RaceTools_SloadThrallIdeoCertainty: Disable Sload thrall Ideology certainty decay.
LanguageData.ESCP_RaceTools_SloadThrallDisableBloodlo: Disable Sload thralls suffering from bloodloss.
LanguageData.ESCP_RaceTools_SloadThrallDisableHeatstr: Disable Sload thralls suffering from heatstroke.
LanguageData.ESCP_RaceTools_SloadThrallDisableHypothe: Disable Sload thralls suffering from hypothermia.
